name: Space Force City Defenders
description:
Space Force City Defenders was created during Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam for the theme of "Keep it Alive"

Use arrow keys to move your ship back and forth to protect your city from meteors until you fail.

Developers:

  • Ben Kaplan (https://www.instagram.com/benjaminkaplanart/)
  • Billy Ross (https://www.facebook.com/rillybossstudios/)
  • Scott Pantall (https://www.scottpantall.com/)
